trans-unit.source: Displays a single-month calendar that enables the user to select dates and move to the next or previous month.
trans-unit.target: 显示一个月的日历，用户能够用它选择日期并移到下一个月或上个月。

trans-unit.source: In this topic:
trans-unit.target: 本主题内容：

trans-unit.source: [Introduction](#Introduction)
trans-unit.target: [介绍](#Introduction)

trans-unit.source: [Accessibility](#Accessibility)
trans-unit.target: [辅助功能](#Accessibility)

trans-unit.source: [Declarative Syntax](#DeclarativeSyntax)
trans-unit.target: [声明性语法](#DeclarativeSyntax)

trans-unit.source: Introduction
trans-unit.target: 介绍

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control to display a single month of a calendar on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控件在网页上显示单个月份的日历。

trans-unit.source: The control allows you to select dates and move to the next or previous month.
trans-unit.target: 控件可以选择日期并移到下一步或上一个月份。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control supports all the <xref:System.Globalization.Calendar?displayProperty=nameWithType> types in the <xref:System.Globalization> namespace.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控件支持所有<xref:System.Globalization.Calendar?displayProperty=nameWithType>中的类型<xref:System.Globalization>命名空间。

trans-unit.source: Apart from the Gregorian calendar, this also includes calendars that use different year and month systems, such as the Hjiri calendar.
trans-unit.target: 除了公历，这还包括不同年份和月份系统，例如 Hjiri 日历使用的日历。

trans-unit.source: You can specify whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control allows you to select a single day, week, or entire month by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以指定是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控件允许你通过设置中选择一天、 周或整月<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: By default, the control displays the days of the month, day headings for the days of the week, a title with the month name and year, links for selecting individual days of the month, and links for moving to the next and previous month.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，该控件显示月份中的天标头的星期日期，使用月份名称和年、 用于选择各个月中的日期，链接和将移动到下一步和上一个月的链接的标题。

trans-unit.source: You can customize the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control by setting the properties that control the style for different parts of the control.
trans-unit.target: 你可以自定义的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>通过设置用于控制控件的不同部分的样式的属性的控件。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the properties that specify the style for the different parts of the control.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出了指定的不同部分的控件的样式的属性。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Specifies the style for the section that displays the days of the week.
trans-unit.target: 指定显示一周中的各天的部分的样式。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the style for the dates in the displayed month.
trans-unit.target: 指定在显示的月份日期的样式。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the style for the navigation controls in the title section.
trans-unit.target: 在标题部分中指定的导航控件的样式。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the style for the dates that are not in the currently displayed month.
trans-unit.target: 指定不在当前显示的月份日期的样式。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the style for the selected dates on the calendar.
trans-unit.target: 在选定日期的日历上指定的样式。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the style for the week and month date-selection column.
trans-unit.target: 指定周和月份日期选择列的样式。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the style for the title section.
trans-unit.target: 指定的标题区域的样式。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the style for today's date.
trans-unit.target: 指定为今天的日期的样式。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the style for the weekend dates.
trans-unit.target: 指定周末日期的样式。

trans-unit.source: You can also show or hide different parts of the control.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以显示或隐藏的控件的不同部分。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the properties that control which parts are shown or hidden.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出用于控制哪些部分是显示还是隐藏的属性。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Shows or hides the section that displays the days of the week.
trans-unit.target: 显示或隐藏显示一周中的各天的部分。

trans-unit.source: Shows or hides the gridlines between the days of the month.
trans-unit.target: 显示或隐藏月份中的天之间的网格线。

trans-unit.source: Shows or hides the navigation controls to the next or previous month.
trans-unit.target: 显示或隐藏的下一步或上一个月份的导航控件。

trans-unit.source: Shows or hides the title section.
trans-unit.target: 显示或隐藏标题部分。

trans-unit.source: Although binding to a data source is not supported for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control, you can modify the content and formatting of the individual date cells.
trans-unit.target: 尽管绑定到数据源不支持<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控件，你可以修改的内容和格式的各个日期单元格。

trans-unit.source: Before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control is displayed on the Web page, it creates and assembles the components that make up the control.
trans-unit.target: 之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控件显示在网页上，它会创建并汇编构成控件的组件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender> event is raised when each date cell in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control is created.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender>引发事件时的每一天中的单元格<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>创建控件。

trans-unit.source: You can control the contents and formatting of a date cell as it is created by providing code in the event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender> event.
trans-unit.target: 可以控制内容，因为它的日期单元格的格式提供事件处理程序中的代码是否创建<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender>事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information on customizing the contents of a date cell, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OnDayRender%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关自定义日期单元格的内容的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OnDayRender%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control renders ECMAScript (JScript, JavaScript) to the client browser.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控件呈现给客户端浏览器 ECMAScript （JScript、 JavaScript）。

trans-unit.source: The client browser must have ECMAScript enabled for this control to function properly.
trans-unit.target: 客户端浏览器必须具有 ECMAScript 对于此控件启用才能正常工作。

trans-unit.source: For more information on client script, see [Client Script in ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/13edb6b9-2dea-43c6-b8c1-a47207de19aa).
trans-unit.target: 有关客户端脚本的详细信息，请参阅[客户端脚本中的 ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/13edb6b9-2dea-43c6-b8c1-a47207de19aa)。

trans-unit.source: Accessibility
trans-unit.target: 可访问性

trans-unit.source: The markup rendered by default for this control might not conform to accessibility standards.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，对于此控件呈现的标记可能不符合辅助功能标准。

trans-unit.source: For details about accessibility support for this control, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).
trans-unit.target: 对于此控件的辅助功能支持的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 控件和可访问性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0)。

trans-unit.target: 声明性语法

trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数来创建和初始化的新实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>类。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建和初始化的新实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a text value that is rendered as a caption for the calendar.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置呈现为日历标题的文本值。

trans-unit.source: The table caption.
trans-unit.target: 表标题。

trans-unit.source: A table caption is used to describe the nature of the table in one to three sentences.
trans-unit.target: 表标题用于描述一到三个句子中的表的性质。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.CaptionAlign%2A> property to align the caption with the calendar.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.CaptionAlign%2A>属性使用日历标题的对齐。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.Caption%2A> property to display a caption for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.Caption%2A>属性显示的标题<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alignment of the text that is rendered as a caption for the calendar.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置呈现为日历标题的文本的对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign" /> value that indicates the alignment of the caption.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign" /> 值，指示标题的对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: This property determines where the caption appears in relation to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: 此属性确定标题相对于出现的位置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控件。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign.NotSet>, which lets the browser determine where to align the caption.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign.NotSet>，它可让浏览器确定要将对齐标题位置。

trans-unit.source: The following table explains the relationship between the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign> value and the appearance of the caption.
trans-unit.target: 下表说明之间的关系<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign>值和标题的外观。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign> value
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign> 值

trans-unit.source: Appearance
trans-unit.target: 外观

trans-unit.source: The caption appears at the bottom of the calendar, with the text centered.
trans-unit.target: 文本居中情况下，该日历，底部将显示标题。

trans-unit.source: The caption appears at the top of the calendar, with the text left-aligned.
trans-unit.target: 标题显示在日历上，使用左对齐的文本的顶部。

trans-unit.source: The caption alignment is not set and is determined by the browser.
trans-unit.target: 标题对齐未设置，并由浏览器。

trans-unit.source: The caption appears at the top of the calendar, with the text right-aligned.
trans-unit.target: 标题显示在日历上，使用右对齐的文本的顶部。

trans-unit.source: The caption appears at the top of the calendar with the text centered.
trans-unit.target: 标题文本居中显示在日历的顶部。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.CaptionAlign%2A>属性对齐的标题<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控件。

trans-unit.source: The value specified is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值不是 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of space between the contents of a cell and the cell's border.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置单元格的内容和单元格的边框之间的空间量。

trans-unit.source: The amount of space (in pixels) between the contents of a cell and the cell's border.
trans-unit.target: 单元格的内容和单元格的边框之间的空间量（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="2" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="2" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to control the spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell's border.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性来控制单元格的内容和单元格的边框之间的间距。

trans-unit.source: The padding amount specified is added to all four sides of a cell.
trans-unit.target: 指定的填充量添加到单元格的所有四个边。

trans-unit.source: Individual cell sizes cannot be specified.
trans-unit.target: 不能指定单个单元格的大小。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to `-1` indicates that this property is not set in the rendered table.
trans-unit.target: 此属性设置为`-1`指示呈现的表中未设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.CellPadding%2A> property to pad each cell with 5 pixels.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.CellPadding%2A>属性填充具有 5 个像素的每个单元格。

trans-unit.source: The specified cell padding is less than -1.
trans-unit.target: 指定的单元格填充量小于 -1。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of space between cells.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置单元格间的空间量。

trans-unit.source: The amount of space (in pixels) between cells.
trans-unit.target: 单元格间的空间量（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="0" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="0" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to control the spacing between individual cells in the calendar.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性来控制在日历中的各个单元格之间的间距。

trans-unit.source: This spacing is applied both vertically and horizontally.
trans-unit.target: 在垂直方向和水平应用此间距。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to `-1` indicates that this property is not set in the rendered table.
trans-unit.target: 此属性设置为`-1`指示呈现的表中未设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.CellSpacing%2A> property to space the cells 5 pixels apart.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.CellSpacing%2A>属性空间相隔的单元格 5 像素。

trans-unit.source: The specified cell spacing is less than -1.
trans-unit.target: 指定的单元格间距小于 -1。

trans-unit.source: Creates a collection to store child controls.
trans-unit.target: 创建用于存储子控件的集合。

trans-unit.source: Always returns an <see langword="InternalControlCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 始终返回 <see langword="InternalControlCollection" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.CreateControlCollection%2A> method is primarily of interest to control developers who extend the functionality of the Calendar control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.CreateControlCollection%2A>方法是主要由控件开发人员扩展月历控件的功能。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.CreateControlCollection%2A> method in a custom server control so that it always returns a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.EmptyControlCollection> class for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何重写<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.CreateControlCollection%2A>方法中的自定义的服务器控件，以便它始终返回的新实例<xref:System.Web.UI.EmptyControlCollection>类<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the style properties for the section that displays the day of the week.
trans-unit.target: 获取显示一周中某天的部分的样式属性。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> that contains the style properties for the section that displays the day of the week.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" />，包含显示周中某天的部分的样式属性。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify the style for the section that displays the days of the week.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于指定显示一周中的各天的部分的样式。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the different style properties that can be controlled, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>.
trans-unit.target: 可以控制不同的样式属性的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>。

trans-unit.source: The name format for the days of the week is controlled by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayNameFormat%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 每周天数的名称格式由控制<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayNameFormat%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: This property applies only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowDayHeader%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 仅当 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowDayHeader%2A> 属性设置为 `true` 时才应用此属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayHeaderStyle%2A> property to specify a bold font for the section that displays the days of the week.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayHeaderStyle%2A>属性指定粗体显示的一周中各天的部分。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name format for days of the week.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置周中各天的名称格式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayNameFormat" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayNameFormat" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="Short" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="Short" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayNameFormat%2A> property to specify the name format for the days of the week.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayNameFormat%2A>属性指定的名称格式为每周天数。

trans-unit.source: This property is set with one of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayNameFormat> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 此属性设置的其中一条<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayNameFormat>枚举值。

trans-unit.source: You can specify whether the days of the week are displayed as the full name, short (abbreviated) name, first letter of the day, or first two letters of the day.
trans-unit.target: 你可以指定是否每周天数显示为完整的名称，短 （缩写） 的名称、 一天中的第一个字母或一天中的前两个字母。

trans-unit.source: This property applies only if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowDayHeader%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此属性仅适用于<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowDayHeader%2A>属性设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: The day names are based on the server's local settings.
trans-unit.target: 星期几名称基于服务器的本地设置。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayNameFormat%2A> property to specify that days of the week are displayed in full.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayNameFormat%2A>属性来指定完全显示的每周天数。

trans-unit.source: The specified day name format is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayNameFormat" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 指定的日名称格式不是 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayNameFormat" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when each day is created in the control hierarchy for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 当为 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> 控件在控件层次结构中创建每一天时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised when each day is created in the control hierarchy for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: 每一天创建控件层次结构中时引发此事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控件。

trans-unit.source: Although data binding is not supported for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control, it is possible to modify the content and formatting of the individual date cells.
trans-unit.target: 尽管不支持数据绑定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控件，它是可以修改内容以及各个日期单元格的格式设置。

trans-unit.source: Before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control is displayed on the Web page, it creates and assembles the components that make up the control.
trans-unit.target: 之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控件显示在网页上，它会创建并汇编构成控件的组件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender> event is raised when each date cell in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control is created.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender>引发事件时的每一天中的单元格<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>创建控件。

trans-unit.source: You can control the contents and formatting of a date cell when it is created by providing code in the event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender> event.
trans-unit.target: 你可以控制的内容和提供的事件处理程序中的代码创建时的日期单元格格式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender>事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information on customizing the contents of a date cell, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OnDayRender%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关自定义日期单元格的内容的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OnDayRender%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender> event is raised while the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control is being rendered, you cannot add a control that can also raise an event, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender>引发事件时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>时呈现控件，所以无法添加的控件，也可以引发事件，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>。

trans-unit.source: You can only add static controls, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>.
trans-unit.target: 你仅可以添加静态控件，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender> event to make the background color yellow for the days in the displayed month.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何指定和代码的处理程序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender>事件以使的背景色的中显示的月份日期为黄色。

trans-unit.source: It also demonstrates how to customize the contents of a cell by adding a <xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl?displayProperty=nameWithType> control to the cell.
trans-unit.target: 它还演示了如何通过添加自定义单元格的内容<xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl?displayProperty=nameWithType>到单元格的控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the style properties for the days in the displayed month.
trans-unit.target: 获取显示的月份中日期的样式属性。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> that contains the style properties for the days in the displayed month.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" />，包含显示的月份中日期的样式属性。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify the style for the days in the displayed month.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性指定的中显示的月份日期的样式。

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a different style for the selected date, weekend dates, dates not in the currently displayed month, or today's date, these dates will also be displayed using the style specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果未为所选的日期、 周末日期、 不在当前显示的月份日期或今天的日期指定不同的样式，这些日期也会显示使用指定的样式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayStyle%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDayStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.WeekendDayStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OtherMonthDayStyle%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.TodayDayStyle%2A> properties to specify alternative styles for these dates.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDayStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.WeekendDayStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OtherMonthDayStyle%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.TodayDayStyle%2A>属性以指定备用样式，这些日期。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the different style properties that can be controlled, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>.
trans-unit.target: 可以控制不同的样式属性的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayStyle%2A> property to specify that the days in the currently displayed month are shown in gray.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayStyle%2A>属性指定以灰色显示当前所显示月份中的天数。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the day of the week to display in the first day column of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> 控件的第一天列中显示的一周中的某天。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FirstDayOfWeek" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FirstDayOfWeek" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="Default" />, which indicates that the day specified in the system setting is used.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="Default" />，指示使用系统设置中指定的日。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.FirstDayOfWeek%2A> property to specify the day of the week to display in the first day column of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.FirstDayOfWeek%2A>属性指定在一周的第一天列中显示星期几<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控件。

trans-unit.source: This property is set with one of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FirstDayOfWeek> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 此属性设置的其中一条<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FirstDayOfWeek>枚举值。

trans-unit.source: You can specify any day of the week or `FirstDayOfWeek.Default`, which indicates that the date is determined by the system settings.
trans-unit.target: 你可以指定一周中的任何一天或`FirstDayOfWeek.Default`，指示日期由系统设置。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.FirstDayOfWeek%2A> property to set the first day column to Monday.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.FirstDayOfWeek%2A>属性设置为星期一的第一天列。

trans-unit.source: The date specified is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FirstDayOfWeek" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 指定的日期不是 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FirstDayOfWeek" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarSelectionMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarSelectionMode" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarSelectionMode" /> object contains week selectors.
trans-unit.target: 确定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarSelectionMode" /> 对象是否包含周选择器。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarSelectionMode" /> contains week selectors; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarSelectionMode" /> 包含周选择器，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarSelectionMode> values `DayWeek` and `DayWeekMonth` both contain week selectors.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarSelectionMode>值`DayWeek`和`DayWeekMonth`都包含周选择器。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何确定其值的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.HasWeekSelectors%2A>中自定义属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that contains the saved condition of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> 的保存状态。

trans-unit.source: Loads a saved state of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 加载 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> 控件的保存状态。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text displayed for the next month navigation control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置为下一月导航控件显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: The caption text for the next month navigation control.
trans-unit.target: 下一月导航控件的标题文本。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword=""&gt;"" />, which is rendered as the greater than sign (>).
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<see langword=""&gt;"" />，它呈现为大于号 (>)。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.NextMonthText%2A> property to provide custom text for the next month navigation control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.NextMonthText%2A>属性为下一个月导航控件提供自定义文本。

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used along with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.PrevMonthText%2A> property to provide a custom set of navigation controls.
trans-unit.target: 此属性连同常用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.PrevMonthText%2A>要提供一组自定义导航控件的属性。

trans-unit.source: This property does not automatically encode to HTML.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不会自动编码为 HTML。

trans-unit.source: You need to convert special characters to the appropriate HTML value, unless you want the characters to be treated as HTML.
trans-unit.target: 你需要将特殊字符转换为适当的 HTML 值，除非你想要被视为 HTML 的字符。

trans-unit.source: For example, to explicitly display the greater than symbol (>), you must use the value `>`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要显式显示大于号 (>)，你必须使用值`>`。

trans-unit.source: Because this property does not automatically encode to HTML, it is possible to specify an HTML tag for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.NextMonthText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不会自动编码为 HTML，因为它是可以指定用于的 HTML 标记<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.NextMonthText%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to display an image for the next month navigation control, you can set this property to an expression that contains an `` element.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你想要显示下一个月导航控件的映像，你可以将此属性设置为包含的表达式``元素。

trans-unit.source: This property applies only if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowNextPrevMonth%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此属性仅适用于<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowNextPrevMonth%2A>属性设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.NextMonthText%2A>属性来指定为下个月的导航控件的自定义文本。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the format of the next and previous month navigation elements in the title section of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> 控件的标题部分中下个月和上个月导航元素的格式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPrevFormat" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPrevFormat" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="CustomText" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="CustomText" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.NextPrevFormat%2A> property to specify the format for the next and previous month navigation elements on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.NextPrevFormat%2A>属性以指定的下一步和上一个月导航元素的格式有关<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控件。

trans-unit.source: This property is set with one of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPrevFormat> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 此属性设置的其中一条<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPrevFormat>枚举值。

trans-unit.source: You can specify whether the text for the navigation controls is displayed as the full month name, the short (abbreviated) month name, or custom text.
trans-unit.target: 你可以指定是否将导航控件的文本显示为完整的月份名称、 短 （缩写） 的月份名称或自定义文本。

trans-unit.source: To specify custom navigation text, set this property to `NextPrevFormat.CustomText` and set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.NextMonthText%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.PrevMonthText%2A> properties to the custom text.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定自定义导航文本，请将此属性设置为`NextPrevFormat.CustomText`并设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.NextMonthText%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.PrevMonthText%2A>属性设置为自定义的文本。

trans-unit.source: This property applies only if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowNextPrevMonth%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此属性仅适用于<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowNextPrevMonth%2A>属性设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.NextPrevFormat%2A> property to specify the short month format for the navigation controls.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.NextPrevFormat%2A>属性指定的导航控件的短月份格式。

trans-unit.source: The specified format is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPrevFormat" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 指定的格式不是 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPrevFormat" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Gets the style properties for the next and previous month navigation elements.
trans-unit.target: 获取下个月和上个月导航元素的样式属性。

trans-unit.source: The style properties for the next and previous month navigation elements.
trans-unit.target: 下个月和上个月导航元素的样式属性。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify the style for the next and previous month navigation elements.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于指定下一步和上一个月导航元素的样式。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the different style properties that can be controlled, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>.
trans-unit.target: 可以控制不同的样式属性的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>。

trans-unit.source: This property applies only if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowNextPrevMonth%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此属性仅适用于<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowNextPrevMonth%2A>属性设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.NextPrevStyle%2A> property to specify blue text for the next month and previous month navigation controls.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.NextPrevStyle%2A>属性指定为下个月和上一个月份导航的蓝色文本控件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell" /> that contains information about the cell to render.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell" />，包含有关要呈现的单元格的信息。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarDay" /> that contains information about the day to render.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarDay" />，包含有关要呈现的日的信息。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender" /> event of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> control and allows you to provide a custom handler for the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender" /> 控件的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> 事件并使您可以为 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender" /> 事件提供自定义处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Although data binding is not supported for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control, it is possible to modify the content and formatting of the individual date cells.
trans-unit.target: 尽管不支持数据绑定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控件，它是可以修改内容以及各个日期单元格的格式设置。

trans-unit.source: Before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control is displayed on the Web page, it creates and assembles the components that make up the control.
trans-unit.target: 之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控件显示在网页上，它会创建并汇编构成控件的组件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender> event is raised when each date cell in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control is created.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender>引发事件时的每一天中的单元格<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>创建控件。

trans-unit.source: You can control the contents and formatting of a date cell when it is created by providing code in the event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender> event.
trans-unit.target: 你可以控制的内容和提供的事件处理程序中的代码创建时的日期单元格格式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender>事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler receives a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayRenderEventArgs> object that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序接收<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayRenderEventArgs>包含事件数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayRenderEventArgs> object contains two properties that you can use to programmatically control the format of the date cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayRenderEventArgs>对象包含可用于以编程方式控制日期单元格的格式的两个属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayRenderEventArgs.Cell%2A> property represents the cell being rendered, while the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayRenderEventArgs.Day%2A> property represents the date to render in the cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayRenderEventArgs.Cell%2A>属性表示单元格呈现，而<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayRenderEventArgs.Day%2A>属性表示要呈现的单元格中的日期。

trans-unit.source: You can also customize the contents of a cell by dynamically adding controls to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayRenderEventArgs.Cell%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以通过动态添加到的控件定义单元格的内容<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayRenderEventArgs.Cell%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender> event is raised while the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control is being rendered, you cannot add a control that can also raise an event, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender>引发事件时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>时呈现控件，所以无法添加的控件，也可以引发事件，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>。

trans-unit.source: You can only add static controls, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> that contains the style properties for the days on the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> control that are not in the displayed month.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" />，包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> 控件上不在显示月份中的日期的样式属性。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify the style for the days on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control that are not in the displayed month.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性中的天上指定的样式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>不在所显示月份的控件。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OtherMonthDayStyle%2A> property is not set, the style specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayStyle%2A> property is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OtherMonthDayStyle%2A>中未设置属性，该样式指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayStyle%2A>使用属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the different style properties that can be controlled, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>.
trans-unit.target: 可以控制不同的样式属性的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OtherMonthDayStyle%2A>属性以指定的天的浅灰色前景颜色，有关<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>不在当前显示的月份的控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text displayed for the previous month navigation control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置为前一月导航控件显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: The caption text for the previous month navigation control.
trans-unit.target: 前一月导航控件的标题文本。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword=""&lt;"" />, which is rendered as the less than sign (<).
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<see langword=""&lt;"" />，它呈现为小于号 (<)。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.PrevMonthText%2A> property to provide custom text for the previous month navigation control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.PrevMonthText%2A>属性来提供自定义文本的上一个月份导航控件。

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used along with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.NextMonthText%2A> property to provide a custom set of navigation controls.
trans-unit.target: 此属性连同常用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.NextMonthText%2A>要提供一组自定义导航控件的属性。

trans-unit.source: This property does not automatically encode to HTML.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不会自动编码为 HTML。

trans-unit.source: You need to convert special characters to the appropriate HTML value, unless you want the characters to be treated as HTML.
trans-unit.target: 你需要将特殊字符转换为适当的 HTML 值，除非你想要被视为 HTML 的字符。

trans-unit.source: For example, to explicitly display the greater than symbol (>), you must use the value `>`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要显式显示大于号 (>)，你必须使用值`>`。

trans-unit.source: Because this property does not automatically encode to HTML, it is possible to specify an HTML tag for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.PrevMonthText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不会自动编码为 HTML，因为它是可以指定用于的 HTML 标记<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.PrevMonthText%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to display an image for the next month navigation control, you can set this property to an expression that contains an `` element.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你想要显示下一个月导航控件的映像，你可以将此属性设置为包含的表达式``元素。

trans-unit.source: This property applies only if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowNextPrevMonth%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此属性仅适用于<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowNextPrevMonth%2A>属性设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.PrevMonthText%2A> property to specify custom text for the previous month navigation control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.PrevMonthText%2A>属性来指定自定义的上一个月份导航控件的文本。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the event argument passed to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，表示传递给事件处理程序的事件参数。

trans-unit.source: Raises an event for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> control when it posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> 控件回发到服务器时引发此控件的事件。

trans-unit.source: This event is used internally by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: 内部使用此事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> that contains the output stream for rendering on the client.
trans-unit.target: 包含用于在客户端上进行呈现的输出流的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: Displays the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> control on the client.
trans-unit.target: 在客户端上显示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> 控件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.Render%2A> method in a custom server control so that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> always displays an image.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何重写<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.Render%2A>自定义服务器控件中的方法，以便<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>始终显示图像。

trans-unit.source: Stores the state of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 存储 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> 控件的状态。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the saved state of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> 的已保存状态的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the selected date.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置选定的日期。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that represents the selected date.
trans-unit.target: 表示选定日期的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.DateTime.MinValue" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.DateTime.MinValue" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> property to determine the selected date on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>属性来确定所选的日期上<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A> collection are closely related.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>属性和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>集合密切相关。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A> property is set to `CalendarSelectionMode.Day`, a mode that allows only a single date selection, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> and `SelectedDates[0]` have the same value and `SelectedDates.Count` equals 1.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A>属性设置为`CalendarSelectionMode.Day`，一种模式，允许仅选择一个日期，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>和`SelectedDates[0]`具有相同的值和`SelectedDates.Count`等于 1。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A> property is set to `CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeek` or `CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeekMonth`, modes that allows multiple date selections, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> and `SelectedDates[0]` have the same value.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A>属性设置为`CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeek`或`CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeekMonth`，允许多个的日期选择的模式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>和`SelectedDates[0]`具有相同的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> property is set using a <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=nameWithType> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>属性使用设置<xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=nameWithType>对象。

trans-unit.source: When the user selects a date on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 当用户选择日期上<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged>引发事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> property is updated to the selected date.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>属性更新为所选日期。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A> collection is also updated to contain just this date.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>集合也会更新以包含只是此日期。

trans-unit.source: Both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A> collection are updated before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 这两个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>属性和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>集合均被更新之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged>引发事件。

trans-unit.source: You can override the date selection by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OnSelectionChanged%2A> event handler to manually set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过使用替代日期选择<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OnSelectionChanged%2A>事件处理程序来手动设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged> event does not get raised when this property is programmatically set.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged>时以编程方式设置此属性，不会不获取引发事件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> property to determine the selected date on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>属性来确定所选的日期上<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> objects that represent the selected dates on the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 对象的集合，这些对象表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> 控件上的选定日期。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection" /> that contains a collection of <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> objects representing the selected dates on the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection" />，包含表示 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 上的选定日期的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> 对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A> collection to determine the currently selected dates on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>集合以确定当前所选的日期上<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A> collection are closely related.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>属性和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>集合密切相关。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A> property is set to `CalendarSelectionMode.Day`, a mode that allows only a single date selection, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> and `SelectedDates[0]` have the same value and `SelectedDates.Count` equals 1.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A>属性设置为`CalendarSelectionMode.Day`，一种模式，允许仅选择一个日期，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>和`SelectedDates[0]`具有相同的值和`SelectedDates.Count`等于 1。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A> property is set to `CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeek` or `CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeekMonth`, modes that allows multiple date selections, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> and `SelectedDates[0]` have the same value.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A>属性设置为`CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeek`或`CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeekMonth`，允许多个的日期选择的模式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>和`SelectedDates[0]`具有相同的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A> property stores a collection of <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=nameWithType> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>属性存储的集合<xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=nameWithType>对象。

trans-unit.source: When the user selects a week or month on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 当用户选择一周或每月上<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged>引发事件。

trans-unit.source: The selected dates are added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A> collection, replacing the previous contents.
trans-unit.target: 所选的日期添加到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>集合，替换以前的内容。

trans-unit.source: The range of dates are sorted in ascending order by date.
trans-unit.target: 以升序按日期排序的日期范围。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> property is also updated to contain the first date in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>属性也会更新以包含中的第一个日期<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A> collection to programmatically select dates on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>集合以编程方式选择上的日期<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection.Remove%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection.Clear%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection.SelectRange%2A> methods to programmatically manipulate the selected dates in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection.Add%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection.Remove%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection.Clear%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection.SelectRange%2A>方法以编程方式操作中的选定的日期<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: Both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A> collection are updated before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 这两个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>属性和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>集合均被更新之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged>引发事件。

trans-unit.source: You can override the date selection by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OnSelectionChanged%2A> event handler to manually set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过使用替代日期选择<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OnSelectionChanged%2A>事件处理程序来手动设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged> event is not raised when this collection is programmatically set.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged>时以编程方式设置此集合，将不会引发事件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A> collection to determine the selected dates on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>集合以确定上的选定的日期<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the style properties for the selected dates.
trans-unit.target: 获取选定日期的样式属性。

trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" />，包含选定日期的样式属性。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify the style for the selected dates on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性指定在选定日期的样式上<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控件。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDayStyle%2A> property is not set, the style specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayStyle%2A> property is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDayStyle%2A>中未设置属性，该样式指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayStyle%2A>使用属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the different style properties that can be controlled, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>.
trans-unit.target: 可以控制不同的样式属性的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDayStyle%2A> property to specify a blue background color for the selected dates on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDayStyle%2A>属性以指定在选定日期的蓝色背景色，有关<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user selects a day, a week, or an entire month by clicking the date selector controls.
trans-unit.target: 当用户通过单击日期选择器控件选择一天、一周或整月时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised when the user selects a day, a week, or an entire month by clicking the date selector controls.
trans-unit.target: 当用户通过单击日期选择器控件中选择一天、 一周或整月时，引发此事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged> event to display the number of items selected in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何指定和代码的处理程序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged>事件以显示中选择的项的数目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the date selection mode on the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> control that specifies whether the user can select a single day, a week, or an entire month.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> 控件上的日期选择模式，该模式指定用户可以选择单日、一周还是整月。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarSelectionMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarSelectionMode" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="Day" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="Day" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A> property to specify the date selection mode on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A>属性上指定的日期选择模式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控件。

trans-unit.source: This property is set with one of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarSelectionMode> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 此属性设置的其中一条<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarSelectionMode>枚举值。

trans-unit.source: You can specify whether the user can select a single day, a week, or an entire month, or you can disable date-selection capability entirely.
trans-unit.target: 你可以指定用户可以选择一天、 周或整月，还是可以完全禁用日期选择功能。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeek` or `CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeekMonth`, an additional selector column that contains week and month selection controls is displayed in the first column of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性设置为`CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeek`或`CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeekMonth`，包含周和月份选择控件的其他选择器列中的第一列显示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectorStyle%2A> property to customize the appearance of this column.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectorStyle%2A>属性可自定义此列的外观。

trans-unit.source: To disable date selection, set this property to `CalendarSelectionMode.None`.
trans-unit.target: 若要禁用日期选择，请将此属性设置为`CalendarSelectionMode.None`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A> property to allow date selection by a single day, a week, or an entire month.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A>属性，以允许通过一天、 周或整月的日期选择。

trans-unit.target: 指定的选择模式不是 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarSelectionMode" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text displayed for the month selection element in the selector column.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置为选择器列中月份选择元素显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: The text displayed for the month selection element in the selector column.
trans-unit.target: 为选择器列中月份选择元素显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword=""&gt;&gt;"" />, which is rendered as two greater than signs (>>).
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<see langword=""&gt;&gt;"" />，它呈现为两个大于号 (>>)。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectMonthText%2A> property to provide custom text for the month selection element in the selector column.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectMonthText%2A>属性来选择器列中的月所选内容元素提供自定义文本。

trans-unit.source: This property does not automatically encode to HTML.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不会自动编码为 HTML。

trans-unit.source: You need to convert special characters to the appropriate HTML value, unless you want the characters to be treated as HTML.
trans-unit.target: 你需要将特殊字符转换为适当的 HTML 值，除非你想要被视为 HTML 的字符。

trans-unit.source: For example, to explicitly display the greater than symbol (>), you must use the value `>`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要显式显示大于号 (>)，你必须使用值`>`。

trans-unit.source: Because this property does not automatically encode to HTML, it is possible to specify an HTML tag for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectMonthText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不会自动编码为 HTML，因为它是可以指定用于的 HTML 标记<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectMonthText%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to display an image for the next month navigation control, you can set this property to an expression that contains an `` element.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你想要显示下一个月导航控件的映像，你可以将此属性设置为包含的表达式``元素。

trans-unit.source: This property applies only if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A> property is set to `CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeekMonth`.
trans-unit.target: 此属性仅适用于<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A>属性设置为`CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeekMonth`。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the heading for the days of the week is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否显示一周中各天的标头。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the heading for the days of the week is displayed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果显示一周中各天的标头，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowDayHeader%2A> property to specify whether the heading for the days of the week is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowDayHeader%2A>属性以指定是否显示一周中的天的标头。

trans-unit.source: The appearance of the heading can be customized by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayHeaderStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过使用自定义标题的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayHeaderStyle%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowDayHeader%2A> property to hide the heading for the days of the week.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowDayHeader%2A>属性来隐藏一周中的天的标头。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the days on the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> control are separated with gridlines.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否用网格线分隔 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> 控件上的日期。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the days on the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> control are separated with gridlines; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果用网格线分隔 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> 控件上的日期，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowGridLines%2A> property to specify whether the days on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control are separated with gridlines.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowGridLines%2A>属性指定是否在天<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>用网格线分隔控件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowGridLines%2A> property to display the gridlines between days in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowGridLines%2A>属性来显示中的天之间的网格线<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> control displays the next and previous month navigation elements in the title section.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> 控件是否在标题部分显示下个月和上个月导航元素。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> displays the next and previous month navigation elements in the title section; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> 在标题部分显示下个月和上个月导航元素，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowNextPrevMonth%2A> property to specify whether the next and previous month navigation elements are displayed in the title section.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowNextPrevMonth%2A>属性指定是否在标题部分中显示的下一步和上一个月导航元素。

trans-unit.source: The appearance of the next and previous month navigation controls can be customized by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.NextPrevStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过使用自定义导航控件的下一步和以前月份的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.NextPrevStyle%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowNextPrevMonth%2A> property to hide the next and previous month navigation controls in the title section.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowNextPrevMonth%2A>属性来隐藏的下一步和以前月份导航控件的标题部分中。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the title section is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否显示标题部分。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> displays the title section; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> 显示标题部分，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowTitle%2A> property to specify whether the title section is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowTitle%2A>属性以指定是否显示标题部分。

trans-unit.source: Hiding the title section also hides the next and previous month navigation controls.
trans-unit.target: 隐藏的标题部分也会隐藏下一步和上个月导航控件。

trans-unit.source: The appearance of the title section can be customized by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.TitleStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过使用自定义标题部分的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.TitleStyle%2A>属性。
